title: Modern Reinterpretation of Traditional Folk Culture: Arts-Based Problem-Solving Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary understanding of folk culture and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Blended learning combining VR simulations and artistic activities in smartphone-centric limited technological environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply creative problem-solving strategies to adapt traditional folk elements to modern educational contexts with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can derive at least three educational values of folk culture through art-based activities (digital drawing, storytelling).
Learners can design educational activities in a VR simulation environment and present them as a 15-minute demonstration video.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
